connectivity: Micro HDMI D, Hot Shoe, USB 2.0, Video Out
exposure modes: i Auto, Programme, Aperture priority, Shutter priority, Manual, Custom, Photo Store, Scene Select, Art Filter
flash modes: Auto, Red-eye reduction, Fill-in, Off, Red-eye reduction slow sync., Slow sync, Full
focus range: Wide (28mm): 10cm to infinity, Tele (300mm): 80cm to infinity, Super Macro Mode: 5cm to 60cm,Zoom position fixing
metering method: Digital ESP metering , Center weighted average metering, Spot metering, Spot metering with highlight control, Spot metering with shadow control
white balance modes: Auto WB, 6 Preset WBs, 2 Capture WBs, Custom WB(Kelvin setting)
